arts.ttl: Goalkeeper rues ill luck as 10-man Mainz shocks Eintracht Frankfurt 3-1 in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Mainz’s Paul Nebel then scored with a deflected shot for 2-0, and Santos was at fault again when a botched pass invited another Mainz attack. Frankfurt had 34 shots at goal compared to nine by the visitor, which played with a man less from the 21st minute after captain Nadiem Amiri was sent off for catching Ellyes Skhiri’s right ankle with his studs.

arts.ttl: 10-man Mainz stun Eintracht Frankfurt with 3-1 win to finish year
arts.sum: Mainz continued their good form with a 3-1 win at neighbours Eintracht Frankfurt thanks to a Paul Nebel brace, despite a first-half red card for Nadiem Amiri. The drama intensified further in the 21st minute when Mainz captain Nadiem Amiri received a straight red card for a reckless challenge on Skhiri, leaving the visitors with 10 men for over an hour.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Mainz, Kiel, and St. Pauli all deliver upset wins
arts.sum: There were plenty of surprises and goals galore in the final set of 15:30 Bundesliga kickoffs of the 2024 calendar year. Three major upsets saw Mainz, Holstein Kiel, and FC St. Pauli topple favored respective opponents Frankfurt, Augsburg, and Stuttgart. In more expected results, Gladbach and Bremen were able to dispatch Hoffenheim and Union Berlin. With no draws, five victorious sides were able to deliver early Christmas presents to their fans.

arts.ttl: Dino Toppmöller eyes Eintracht Frankfurt revival led by on-song strikers Omar Marmoush and Hugo Ekitiké
arts.sum: Dino Toppmöller has got Omar Marmoush and Hugo Ekitiké firing at Eintracht Frankfurt in the first half of the 2024/25 Bundesliga season - bundesliga.com takes a close look at the man who has helped the Eagles' strikeforce take flight. "From the outside, it may look like a risk to bring Dino in," said Frankfurt's CEO Markus Krösche, who worked at Leipzig at the same time as Topmöller.

arts.ttl: How football and family intertwine for Luton's Tom Krauss
arts.sum: For Tom Krauss, family and football are everything. They are also two things very much intertwined.

arts.ttl: Tuta remains sidelined against Mainz, confirms Toppmöller
arts.sum: Dino Toppmöller has confirmed that Eintracht Frankfurt will once again have to manage without Tuta against Mainz.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Mainz preview: Frankfurt look for a response
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt aim to reignite their push for the top spot in the Bundesliga as they host local rivals Mainz at Deutsche Bank Park on Saturday in their 15th Bundesliga match of the season.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga market values: Harry Kane drops by 10% - Jamie Gittens most valuable Dortmund player
arts.sum: With one matchday to go before the winter break, Transfermarkt has updated the market values of 493 Bundesliga players, and the two most valuable players in the league became even more valuable....

arts.ttl: Omar Marmoush named Bundesliga Player of the Month
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt forward Omar Marmoush has been named Bundesliga Player of the Month for November, scoring and assisting in a 3-2 win against VfB Stuttgart and providing another goal and…

arts.ttl: Preview: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Mainz 05 - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Eintracht Frankfurt and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
